entries.title: Strands SDK Launched
entries.description: AWS announces [Strands Agents](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/opensource/introducing-strands-agents-an-open-source-ai-agents-sdk/), an open source SDK for building AI agents with a model-driven approach. The framework enables developers to build agents by defining prompts and tool lists with minimal code, scaling from simple to complex use cases.

entries.title: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Preview
entries.description: AWS introduces [AgentCore](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/introducing-amazon-bedrock-agentcore-securely-deploy-and-operate-ai-agents-at-any-scale/) in preview, a comprehensive set of enterprise-grade services including Runtime, Memory, Observability, and Identity to help developers deploy and operate AI agents at scale using any framework and model.

entries.title: Kiro Public Preview
entries.description: Amazon launches [Kiro](https://kiro.dev/blog/introducing-kiro/) in public preview, an agentic IDE that introduces spec-driven development to transform "vibe coding" into production-ready software. Built on VS Code OSS and powered by Anthropic's Claude models, Kiro enforces structured workflows from requirements through deployment.

entries.title: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Generally Available
entries.description: AWS announces [General Availability of AgentCore](https://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2025/10/amazon-bedrock-agentcore-available/) with enhanced features including VPC support, AWS PrivateLink, CloudFormation integration, and Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol support for production-ready multi-agent orchestration.

entries.title: Kiro Generally Available
entries.description: [Kiro reaches General Availability](https://kiro.dev/blog/general-availability/) with full production support, offering developers powerful AI-assisted coding capabilities with enhanced security and performance features across macOS, Windows, and Linux.
